title: Why is annie stupid...
body: I used to play a lot of LoL, stopped for a while, trying to get back into it.  But holy shit annie is just stupid. Why is her damage so high AT ALL STAGES OF THE GAME?? It's just stupid to me that she can f*cking nuke a tank w/ 250 MR late game WITH NO MAGIC PEN ITEMS. And then she takes so little damage from carries because she has a f*cking built in braum W?? And to top it all off she has the range of a backline ADC, WHY?!?!? Oh, and some of the highest base damages in the game.  I've just looked at the OP.gg stats for annie and her win rate is 53.5%, isn't that really high?? She's f*cking cancer and i'd love to see this stupid midget c*nt get r*ped by the rework team.

replies.body:
>she has the range of a backline adc

lolwut

looking at your match history, I'm assuming you're talking about your game where you played vlad. the one where you didn't build any mr except for a spectre's cowl, and annie was _20/2/5_

Duh, it's pretty difficult to build anything when this little %%%% is just raping you as soon a you move up to CS cuz range. 625, more than 90% of all ADC's, the ONLY ADC that has a higher range than her without ability modifiers is caitlynn. Otherwise Kog w/ W active and Tristana w/ Q active.

625 range on an immobile mage's abilities is absolutely horrible. Most midlaners have longer range than that. 
and you didn't build a spirit visage with vlad, that's on you. you prioritized rylai's and boots of lucidity for some reason.

also jinx, trist, kog, cait, and twitch all outrange that. why you're comparing aa range to a mage though is beyond me.

annie has zero range

she isnt really that tanky, just enough of damage resist on her shield to mitigate the fact she is kinda a melee range caster

I like to build her like Ap Trist. An adc with a guaranteed stun(which, since you don't need to use your abilities to farm, you can hold onto forever), a free ~16-40% damage reduction and scaling thornmail for every trade, and a pet? (not to mention an aa range that is only surpassed by Ashe, Rocket Jinx, Cait, ulting Twitch, and mid-late Trist). I pity them.
Replace it with yasuo and you would get upvoted hard lol. The bias is real, Annie has fucking point and click aoe cc.

see what it is that you fed that lil girl too much kool aid and candy now she is on a sugar high who didnt take her nap in the afternoon and irritable, if you dont feed her all that sugar and you make sure she takes her full nap she isnt as angry and irritable later. 

AKA 

dont feed and put her down ( kill her) and she isnt an issue

The Tibbers buff was absolutely ridiculous and made her broken again.

She needs to be gutted and stay gutted.

LOL SHE HAS THE RANGE OF A BACKLINE ADC IM DONE

 SHE HAS TO RELY ON FLASH TO GET IN RANGE OF TIBBERS. ONLY AN IDIOT WOULD GO NEAR HER WHEN SHE HAS HER STUN. SHE CAN BE KITED FG IM DONE IM DONE I CANT DO THIS IM DYING RN LMAO

53% is not really high, annie is just obnoxious to low elo/unsuspecting/counterpicked players. Virtually every mage outranges her and wins easily. Just tell your useless botlane to actually ward, so she does not get two free kills every 2 minutes by roaming.

I think you're trolling? but if you're not then idk what to say about annies nuking 250 mr tanks without mpen... as for cancer i think she feels better than ever but that recent tubbers nerf is well deserved
